name: Quan
headline: End-to-end platform to improve wellbeing and team performance.
description:
We provide a self-assessment which identifies the underlying causes of poor wellbeing and match proven solutions for individuals and teams.

https://www.quanwellbeing.com/

founders.name: Arosha Brouwer, Founder
founders.description: Ex-strategy consultant and industry executive with 15 years experience in digitization and team performance improvement.

founders.name: Lucy Howie, Founder
founders.description: Former tech startup CEO in the innovation space, which through to successful exit. Executive at a German unicorn building algorithmic products for consumers + brands.

# Helping busy teams build healthy rituals
Our science-backed employee well-being software helps managers and teams prevent burn-out and enhance team performance.
[ Discover How ](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/<https:/www.quanwellbeing.com/product?hsLang=en>) [ About Us ](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/<https:/www.quanwellbeing.com/en/about-us?hsLang=en>)
![OpenDoodles-Swinging](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/hubfs/OpenDoodles-Swinging.png)
## Individual therapy and self-care tools aren't enough.
### Support the _whole_ team by breaking well-being down into measurable quarterly goals and rituals to improve ways of working.
[ Discover Now ](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/</www.quanwellbeing.com/product?hsLang=en>)
[ The Science Behind Quan ](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/<https:/www.quanwellbeing.com/en/science?hsLang=en>)
## How does it work? It’s as easy as….
1
### Personal Assessment
Team members complete an evidence-based well-being assessment measuring five dimensions:**Mind** , **Body** , **Meaning** , **Social-Connectedness** and **Self-Fulfilment** - providing invaluable insight on the underlying reasons for their current state. Assessments are 100% guaranteed private - no one else can see your individual results.
2
### Team Well-Being Retro
The well-being data collected in the assessments are aggregated and anonymized, highlighting the team's top well-being strengths and risks and their underlying sources. Quan then guides managers and teams through quarterly conversations about team well-being, allowing them to effectively choose which areas to focus on first, and to build the psychological safety they need to openly discuss their ways of working.
3
### **Targeted Rituals & Next Steps**
Teams select recommended rituals to improve their way of working. These easy-to-implement actions are proven to be effective by scientific research in organizational and behavioural psychology. Additionally, HR and Senior Leadership can identify more effective company well-being offerings and steps to better support your people based on aggregate well-being data across teams.
## Trusted by

"Even though we have a very tight team and an open culture - through Quan, individuals were able to discus topics which impacted them but they never really unearthed them because they are so committed to our mission."
> ###### Kelly Hall 
> ###### Managing Director, Niaga @ Covestro
![ruben](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/hs-fs/hubfs/ruben.png?width=120&name=ruben.png)
"The Quan framework helps to bring topics to the surface that normally would get less or no attention, and take effective action on them."
> ###### Ruben Vermaak
> ###### Head of L&D @ Bynder
![Jill](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Jill.png?width=120&name=Jill.png)
"Quan's employee well-being solution was the perfect answer for our marketing leadership team to demonstrate our commitment to our team and to empower our managers to make well-being a priority. Quan is outstanding. Their software really demonstrates why well-being should be seen as an organizational priority for any business."
> ###### Jill Murray 
> ###### CMO @ Arcadis
## Who Is Quan For?
### For Teams
Your problem isn’t underperformance - you’re worried that some team members are _too_ engaged and may potentially burn-out. Do you need a simple way to address underlying problems and identify better ways of working?
[ Learn More ](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/<https:/nurture.quanwellbeing.com/get-your-quote?hs_preview=uoBkrYgX-87878340969&hsLang=en>)
### For HR & Organizations
You've tried mental health apps and coaching, but given the level of investment, it doesn't seem to be making the expected impact. Are you tired of rolling out perks and HR programs that no one uses?
[ Learn More ](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/<https:/nurture.quanwellbeing.com/demo-request?hsLang=en>)
![Arosha BW](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Arosha%20BW.jpg?width=150&height=150&name=Arosha%20BW.jpg)
Don't just say well-being is important. Measure it and manage it. 
Arosha Brouwer, CEO & Co-Founder 
## Customer Use Cases
![Group 8](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Group%208.png?width=600&height=515&name=Group%208.png)
### Busy teams at StartDock rethink time management.
Learn how this Dutch co-working community addressed poor work-life balance, with the help of Quan by zooming into how they schedule personal appointments around full-time work.
[ Read Full Use Case ](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/<https:/blog.quanwellbeing.com/resources/customer-use-case-startdock?hsLang=en>)
### Self-directed teams address underlying issues at Niaga-Covestro.
[Discover](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/<https:/8613376.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/8613376/Events/WELL%202022/Quan%20WELL%202022%20-%20Fireside%20chat%20with%20Kelly%20Hall.mp4>) how even strong & engaged teams can uncover important insights about themselves when they take a structured look at their well-being.
### Remote teams use data and structure to connect on a deeper level at Bynder.
[Learn](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/<https:/www.bynder.com/en/press-media/bynder-prioritizes-employee-mental-wellbeing-through-collaboration-with-quan/>) how Quan helped improve manager-employee conversations and HR and Senior Leadership to identify more effective company well-being offerings.
![Open Doodles - Unboxing](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Open%20Doodles%20-%20Unboxing.png?width=600&height=496&name=Open%20Doodles%20-%20Unboxing.png)
## Ready to get started?
### Start identifying and addressing your team's underlying problems and unhealthy habits _before_ they become issues.
[ Get Started ](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/<https:/nurture.quanwellbeing.com/demo-request?hsLang=en>)
[ Learn More ](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/<https:/www.quanwellbeing.com/pricing-packages?hsLang=en>)
![LOGO-QUAN-SMALL](https://www.quanwellbeing.com/hubfs/Brand%20elements/LOGO-QUAN-SMALL.png)

generated_description:
**Company Overview**

**Name**: Quan  
**Founded**: 2020  
**Location**: The Hague, Netherlands  
**Team Size**: 17 employees  
**Y Combinator**: Part of Batch W22  

**Mission**: Quan aims to provide an end-to-end platform that enhances individual and team well-being while boosting performance. They began by offering self-assessments that help identify the root causes of poor well-being and suggest proven solutions tailored for teams and individuals.

**Core Solution**: Their platform revolves around a comprehensive assessment for team members that evaluates five key dimensions—Mind, Body, Meaning, Social-Connectedness, and Self-Fulfillment. This process is backed by scientific research, ensuring that the insights gathered are reliable and meaningful.

**How It Works**:
1. **Personal Assessment**: Individuals complete a private, evidence-based well-being assessment that identifies their state of well-being.
2. **Team Well-Being Retro**: The aggregated results present anonymized data to highlight strengths and weaknesses in team well-being, facilitating discussions on necessary improvements.
3. **Targeted Rituals**: Teams then select from recommended, research-backed rituals aimed at improving their work culture and preventing burnout.

**Target Market**: 
- **Teams**: Organizations facing issues not necessarily of underperformance, but concerned about burnout due to over-engagement.
- **HR & Leadership**: Businesses tired of ineffective mental health solutions—like generic apps— that don’t make an impact.

**Tags**: mental-health-tech, SaaS, B2B, HR-tech, subscriptions

**Testimonials**: Clients have praised Quan for facilitating conversations around well-being that otherwise might not happen. For example, Kelly Hall of Covestro noted that Quan allows teams to discuss pressing topics that impact them deeply.

**Website**: [quanwellbeing.com](https://www.quanwellbeing.com)

In summary, Quan is about proactively addressing the well-being of teams through structured assessments and actionable insights, ultimately enhancing organizational performance. Whether you’re afraid of burnout or just looking to improve team dynamics, Quan positions itself as a strategic partner in fostering a healthy, high-performing workplace.
